story.synopsys: In the year 1819, a small village nestled in the English countryside finds itself shrouded in an eerie silence. Whispers have begun to circulate among the locals, murmuring of a heinous crime that has left them grasping for answers. The air is thick with tension as the village mourns the loss of one of their own – a prominent member of their community found lifeless in the grand manor at the outskirts of town. The village, once united by their daily interactions, now becomes a labyrinth of suspicion and paranoia as they begin to question their closest friends and neighbors. Secrets are carefully guarded, and everyone seems to possess a motive. In this dimly lit village, where whispers carry grave significance, it falls upon an unlikely hero to untangle the web of deceit and uncover the truth behind this chilling murder.

Silas is known to frequent the local library, delving into ancient texts on forbidden knowledge.
